short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and organize your internet resources

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save and organize everything you discover online with the Keplr Chrome extension.
Connected to Keplr.in, the web's largest community-driven knowledge library, this extension makes it easy to collect, organize, share, and even contribute to valuable internet resources.

Key Features:

1) Save with One Click: Easily save anything interesting you find online. Just right-click and choose 
     "Save to Keplr."
2) Custom Collections: Create personalized collections for different topics or interests.
3) Share Collections: Share your collections with friends, colleagues, or the world.
4) Access Curated Resources: Explore handpicked resources from industry experts across various 
    domains.
5) Discover User Collections: Browse and learn from thousands of user-created collections.
6) Contribute to Existing Collections: Visit any collection on Keplr, click "Contribute," and add to it 
    directly from your extension. The collection will appear in your extension’s "Spaces" section 
    under "Contribute to..."

Perfect for:
Professionals: Collect work resources and tools effortlessly.
Students: Gather study materials and references for projects.
Hobbyists: Save and organize inspiration for your next passion project.
Knowledge Enthusiasts: Create and grow your personal digital library.

Why Choose Keplr?
Join thousands of users already building and sharing their personal knowledge libraries with Keplr. Whether you’re researching for work, collecting creative ideas, or simply saving interesting finds, Keplr keeps everything organized and accessible—right at your fingertips.

Part of the Keplr.in Ecosystem:
Keplr is where hundreds of industry experts contribute curated collections daily. Be part of a growing community of knowledge sharers. Build your digital library and help others grow theirs too.

Free to Use. Install Now!
Start building your personal internet library with the Keplr Chrome extension and explore the endless possibilities of shared knowledge/
